description:
If you're a quick-learn that's looking to setup your first website in a short period of time, this is the course for you.

This is an intermediate/beginner's course for people who want to learn how to setup a professional website using WordPress and install/customize several plugins for extra functionality.

This course is 100% video, mostly in screencast format and I will turn on my camera at certain points to quickly explain concepts. After going through the first three sections, you can skip around to any lecture you wish and learn what you want, when you want.
title: A fast-paced WordPress Website Setup from start to finish
